num = int(raw_input())
if(num%2==0):
    i = num+1
else:
    i = num

ans = 0

while(ans!=2):
    p = i
    nu = 0
    ans= 0
    while(p>0):
        nu = (nu*10) + (p%10)
        p = p/10
    if(nu == i):
        ans+=1
    if(ans==1):
        flag = 0
        for j in range(2,(i/2)+1):
            if(i%j == 0):
                flag = 1
                break
        if(flag!=1):
            ans+=1
            
    i+=2
print nu
